verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: said] [ARG1: former basketball star Dennis Rodman and Kim Jong - un friend Dennis Rodman was not invited to the upcoming summit in Singapore] – but praised his rebounding skills .
President Donald Trump said former basketball star Dennis Rodman and Kim Jong - un friend Dennis Rodman [V: was] not invited to the upcoming summit in Singapore – but praised his rebounding skills .

President Donald Trump said [ARG1: former basketball star Dennis Rodman and Kim Jong - un friend Dennis Rodman] was [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: invited] [ARG2: to the upcoming summit in Singapore] – but praised his rebounding skills .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] said former basketball star Dennis Rodman and Kim Jong - un friend Dennis Rodman was not invited to the upcoming summit in Singapore – but [V: praised] [ARG1: his rebounding skills] .

President Donald Trump said former basketball star Dennis Rodman and Kim Jong - un friend Dennis Rodman was not invited to the upcoming summit in Singapore – but praised [ARG0: his] [V: rebounding] [ARG2: skills] .
